headline.main: TIMOSHENKO VICTOR; 302 Towns Taken Below Lake Ilmen -- Nazis Lose 11,000 Men RUSSIANS GAIN 50 MILES Red Army Reports Repulse of Enemy in Big Tank Battle in Donets Basin TIMOSHENKO VICTOR IN THE ILMEN AREA

lead_paragraph: LONDON, March 1 -- The Russians announced tonight a crushing new Winter offensive in the Lake Ilmen sector south of Leningrad in which they said the forces of Marshal Semyon Timoshenko had captured Demyansk and 301 other localities and had beaten the Germans into a hasty retreat with 11,000 of the enemy killed or captured.
abstract: Timoshenko forces take Demyansk and 301 other towns below Lake Ilmen; Ger 16th Army reptd in flight; USSR repts counter-attacks continue, Donets Basin; Gers rept Donets River reached by Ger tank units; map
